meanings.definition: To make right; to remove errors or faults.
meanings.sent2: The teacher corrects the spelling errors on the test.
meanings.sent3: He always corrects his friend's math errors with a smile.
meanings.sent4: Her guidance corrects the course of our project.

meanings.definition: To point out or mark errors for correction.
meanings.sent1: He corrects the misspelled words in the document.
meanings.sent2: The editor corrects grammar mistakes in the article.
meanings.sent3: The cat corrects the dog's behavior by hissing.
meanings.sent4: The lighthouse corrects the ship's course in the storm.
meanings.sent5: The alarm system corrects errors in the security system.
